EmailTemplate.name: 21_M1_HNW_Global-Express_Nurture.Email 1 from Perry
EmailTemplate.subject: Global Express Incentives for 2021
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Is flight optimization and cost reduction on your to do list? We're running some special incentives <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=plain]]> for Global-Series operators that might interest you.
We also have a few case studies with our customers for reference, please see here:
- George Strait <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/customer-success-stories/2020/04/honeywell-george-strait-connected?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=plain]]> - Brad Keselowski <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/podcasts/brad-keselowski?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=plain]]>
I'll be your point of contact for all things Global—if you'd like more information please feel free to respond or place time on my calendar below.
Take care,
Perry Pelitera +1 602-245-5611
Email me to schedule time: Let me know when you're available <[[mailto:perry.pelitera@honeywell.com?cc=lisa.watmore@honeywell.com&subject=Interested%20in%20more%20information&body=Hi%20Perry%2C%0D%0A%0D%0AI%20would%20like%20more%20information%20on%20the%20offerings%20related%20to%20Global-Series%20aircraft.%0D%0A]]>
